title: QueuePlayer
description: Instructs the matchmaker to queue the provided player until a simulator is available

scenario.description: Instructs the server to use a specific set of rules

player.description: Information about the player to queue

rules_override.description: Defines a specific start state for the player which is additive to the scenario preset

start_mana.description: Available mana for the player at the start of the game

start_hand_size.description: The amount of cards a player has in hand at the start of the game

start_entities.description: Entities starting on the player's side of the board
